name: Lock My WooCommerce
author: capripio

sections.description:
Hide your WooCommerce store, while keeping the rest of your site public.

This plugin hides your whole WooCommerce site, without affecting anything else on the theme. This plugin can hide the main store page, product page, product search page, product category, and tag pages. This plugin also hides Official Widgets of WooCommerce. Perfect & Free plugin for wholesale stores, members-only clubs & more…

These are the following feature of this plugin:

  • Hide without affecting theme.
  • Hide from sidebars (official widgets)
  • Login Form (With a custom message above form)
  • Option to allow users to see a store
  • Hide from search engines
  • And more…
sections.installation:
1. Unzip cp-lock-woocommerce.zip
  2. Upload the contents of cp-lock-woocommerce.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Admin > WooCommerce > Settings > Lock My WooCommerce (Tab)
sections.faq:
I want more features

You can contact me through setting page.

Does it work on all themes

We did our best to go with WordPress standard if there any theme that doing some tricks It might not work. You can contact me in exchange of small fee and I will take a look ðŸ™‚
